{{cpp/experimental/observer_ptr/title|release}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2/observer_ptr/navbar}}

{{ddcl | since=libfund_ts_2 | 1=
constexpr element_type* release() noexcept;
}}

Stop watching the watched object, if any. {{lc|get()}} returns {{c|nullptr}} after the call.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A pointer to the previously watched object, or {{c|nullptr}} if there was no watched object, i.e. the value which would be returned by {{lc|get()}} before the call.
